EmailTemplate.description: Auto Response to Customer for HBS Americas Customer Support Case Creation
EmailTemplate.name: HBS Customer Support Email2Case Response
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Case Number is {!Case.CaseNumber} - {!Case.Subject} {!Case.Thread_Id}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.GDMFSL_Email_Template_Contact__c},
We have received your request regarding {!Case.Subject} and it is currently being reviewed.
Your case number is {!Case.CaseNumber}. Please keep this number for your reference.
Thank you for contacting Honeywell Support.
{!Case.Thread_Id} Terms and conditions | Privacy Statement |
